about_the_game:
Foos is a retro arcade game inspired by the classic game foosball! Play against your friends in the local multiplayer mode, defeat a series of progressively harder opponents with their own unique abilities in the story mode, or go for a high score in the wall ball mode. Grab a controller or keyboard and play—reach 7 points with a 2-point lead to win!

Game Modes:


Story Mode- In the story mode of the game you will unlock a series of opponents, with each using new abilities (and trash talk) to challenge different aspects of how you play the game. Defeat each opponent on your own or team up with a friend and play as either the striker or goalie!
  • The Rival: The Rival is another new player, who you may run into more than once...
  • The Cool Kid: The Cool Kid has been playing for a while, they're kind of lazy but don't underestimate them!
  • Jeremy: Jeremy seems to be in the wrong tournament, he's not sure how he got here but he's having a good time
  • And coming soon, along with many more; The Wizard: A master of illusion, The Wizard may be the trickiest opponent yet!

Local Multiplayer- Along with the story mode you can challenge your friends locally to a 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 or 2 vs 1 match!

Wall Ball- The most arcade game inspired mode, use your standard Foos setup to bounce the ball against a wall and break as many as you can to beat your high score!

Coming soon- Along with the existing modes, I have a training mode in the works with different challenges for specific aspects of the game (defense, aim, bank shots and more!)
